scripts.set-version: mkdir -p build && echo export const VERSION = \"$VERSION\" > build/version.ts
scripts.build: export VERSION=$CF_PAGES_COMMIT_SHA && pnpm run set-version && remix build --sourcemap && pnpm upload-source-map-server && pnpm upload-source-map-browser && pnpm delete-source-map
scripts.upload-source-map-server: export $(../../scripts/gen-env) && wrangler pages functions build --outdir bundled-functions --sourcemap && sentry-cli sourcemaps inject bundled-functions && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --release=$VERSION --dist=server bundled-functions && rm -rf bundled-functions
scripts.upload-source-map-browser: export $(../../scripts/gen-env) && sentry-cli sourcemaps inject public && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --release=$VERSION --dist=browser public
scripts.dev: export VERSION=development && pnpm run set-version && pnpm run dev:config && pnpm run dev:start
scripts.dev:start: export WORKERS_ENV=development && remix dev --no-restart -c "npm run start"
